reviews.title: Not thorough, waste of my time
reviews.text: I waited 3+ weeks for my application to process, with them gathering info piece by tiny piece, only to be told that they couldn't ever have processed it because the value of the property it too low. This should've been checked before I instructed solicitors, and before I paid the valuation fee. The whole process was a huge waste of my time and wouldn't have occurred if they'd just read my application in the first place (which I repeatedly asked my mortgage advisor to do). I am being refunded the valuation but I'm most upset about the waste of my time, and the potential of losing the house I am trying to purchase.

reviews.title: Nothing much but no concern, just only concerned abo...
reviews.text: Nothing much but no concern, just only concerned about the rate which seems high, this needed to be reviewed

reviews.title: All was ok and thats all i have to say.
reviews.text: All was ok and thats all i have to say. Thank you.

reviews.title: Four years ago we were looking for an affordable mor...
reviews.text: Four years ago we were looking for an affordable mortgage, although working many companies wouldn’t lend to us. Our home was a RTB and we could buy with 50% off which was amazing . It wasn’t just a house with lots of land it was a forever home. I was born in our property and wanted to secure the future for my son to ensure he had a roof over his head if anything was to happen to me. Darlington building society have great customer service, the staff are knowledgeable and very helpful. In 2025 we renewed another fixed rate mortgage. The process was very quick and efficient. We live in north east Derbyshire which is miles away from Darlington building society . Darlington gave us good rates. Thank you to Darlington for helping us secure a future for my family. Nobody else had lived in this house from first being built, so for me it was important to keep this property in our family. I will always be grateful to Darlington. I will always highly recommend The Darlington Building society.

reviews.title: Beyond the usual box ticking the best of British!
reviews.text: Darlington provided a mortgage when I and my income didn't 'tick the box' saving a much loved home, with understanding, competent customer service. They are also a genuine building society rooted in their local community.

reviews.title: Brilliant Mortgage Service
reviews.text: I have just gained a new mortgage with Darlington, the process could not have been easier. Clarity of process from start to finish and we have been kept informed all the way as to what was happening and when our payments would be. No hassles just great service and product, I would strongly recommend Darlington.

reviews.title: Everything has already been smooth and straightforwa...
reviews.text: Everything has already been smooth and straightforward with Darlington Bank. I've never needed to contact them for help as everything just happens as it should.

reviews.title: Always at the top of their game!
reviews.text: I do not tend to make that many physical visits to the Darlington branch, but whenever I do, I never consider it to be a chore, as I know that from walking through the door I will be treated courteously and professionally at all times. That instils in me, the confidence to know that I am dealing with, and that I am part of, one of the best financial businesses in the North-East of England.

reviews.title: Happy customer
reviews.text: We built our own house. Darlington was helping with every stage of process

reviews.title: Thank you for hearing me.
reviews.text: I reached out to Darlington BS when having difficulty getting a mortgage after being told I would have to accept an adverse credit mortgage at higher rates. I did not have adverse credit other than a dispute with an energy company that was with the ombudsman, but was being turned down by lenders even my own bank that could see my credit history and finance management. It was demoralising. My friend told me how Darlington BS had listened to her and gave her a standard mortgage so I contacted them. They asked me to provide a full credit report and their underwriters would make a decision, and fortunately found in my favour providing me with a good mortgage and faultless communication and help. I have recommended them to many people since. Thank you DBS.

reviews.title: Excellent customer service.
reviews.text: Excellent customer service. Contacted me weill ahead of the end of Fixed Term Mortgage and offered me a new Fixed Rate. Very pleased with the new rate.

reviews.title: They were able to get me my morgage even though I wa...
reviews.text: They were able to get me my morgage even though I was an older customer

reviews.title: Helpful, friendly and great communication
reviews.text: Very helpful and friendly staff, great communications to members and easy to contact them / speak to someone. Range of suitable products for us which fit our needs. Very responsive and helpful.

reviews.title: Customer
reviews.text: Excellent customer service, replied every query

reviews.title: I was very pleased with the help we got with process...
reviews.text: I was very pleased with the help we got with processing the forms and documents.

reviews.title: Paula Marshall provided an excellent service, she re...
reviews.text: Paula Marshall provided an excellent service, she responds to calls and messages promptly and couldn't be any more helpful

reviews.title: Frustrating at times.
reviews.text: Frustrating at times. Difficult to contact specific people who don’t ring back

reviews.title: Mortgage Adviser (Paula) answered all of my questions.
reviews.text: Mortgage Adviser (Paula) answered all of my questions and provided extra and relevant information. After speaking with her, I feel confident regarding moving to a new property should I decide to do so. A follow-up email was received confirming the information gained during our earlier phone conversation.

reviews.title: Great customer service
reviews.text: Customer service was outstanding when obtaining original mortgage and then moving to a new property. Very quick responses and friendly people. Cheryl in particular was amazing!

reviews.title: Thank you, Paula, for your excellent support
reviews.text: My wife and I have recently had the pleasure of dealing with Paula Marshall regarding our BTL mortgage application, and I could not be more pleased or impressed with the outstanding service we received. Paula has demonstrated high levels of professionalism, coupled with a very much appreciated personal attentiveness. She has been incredibly responsive, efficient, and helpful throughout the process. Paula's communication has been clear and prompt; she has taken the time to clarify any questions I have posed in what has been a new experience for us and has kept us informed at every stage, ensuring everything progressed smoothly. It has been reassuring to know our application was in capable hands. Paula’s approachable manner and attention to detail made what could have been a stressful process much easier. This level of one-to-one personal attention is unusual in this 'virtual age' but it is very much welcomed. Thank you, Paula, for your excellent support and customer care — a true credit to Darlington Building Society!

reviews.title: The staff were extremely helpful with helping sort a...
reviews.text: The staff were extremely helpful with helping sort a last minute mortgage, particularly Linda, Louise and Sehreena. They went above and beyond to help sort last minute complications from my solicitors.

reviews.title: We was a bit unsure whether to apply for additional...
reviews.text: We was a bit unsure whether to apply for additional funds for home improvements or just sell up and move after initially applying for additional funds we changed our minds .Paula Marshall was absolutely brilliant with us she was very understanding and very patient and not at all bothered by our indecision even though we had clearly wasted her time.

reviews.title: Locked out of system
reviews.text: Very helpful after getting locked out of my account. Simon McCabe was very helpful in getting me back in.

reviews.title: Excellent Service all around
reviews.text: I have always found them to be helpful and informative

reviews.title: All of your staff are very professional and polite why
reviews.text: All of your staff are very professional and polite why

reviews.title: Cannot thank the team enough!
reviews.text: Spoke with Paula who has helped me step by step through my transfer of equity and she was patient and understanding along with the rest of the team who did everything they could to assist me, I am over the moon with my outcome and cannot thank the team enough!

reviews.title: Paula was really helpful, polite and supportive
reviews.text: Paula was really polite, very helpful and supported me through the whole process. She helped me every step of the way going above and beyond to get my mortgage approved.

reviews.title: Mortgage Advice & Application
reviews.text: We applied for a single owner joint borrower mortgage to support our son buying his home . The Mortgage Adviser Ann Walpole was excellent throughout the process. It was not just the quality of advice provided and the service , it was the fact that Ann demonstrated real empathy & went the extra mile to ensure that the mortgage was in place to allow our son to purchase his home.

reviews.title: In branch service review
reviews.text: Your mortgage staff are very helpful and went the extra mile to reassure us that changes would be made in a timely manner.

reviews.title: An easy experienc
reviews.text: An easy experience with the mortgage advisor spending time to gather all the relevant information before offering advice.

reviews.title: A breath of fresh air...
reviews.text: Dealing with the Darlington is like a breath of fresh air, having had other mortgages with a range of lenders, Darlington is the one I have gone back to - and would do so again. They are people wo are dealing with people - and their company ethics are actually shared by the people who work for them - it's not just an advertising strap line. Our designated contact person Ann W has been absolutely amazing, going above and beyond to help us with the bureaucracy that has come from all the other people who you have to deal with when taking out a mortgage. She has been patient and kind and you cant ask for better.

reviews.title: On talking to the team, I found them to be very help...
reviews.text: On talking to the team, I found them to be very helpful. When talking to Paula, her help and advice was superb. All telephone appointments were met on time and nothing was too much trouble.

reviews.title: Paula was cordial but thorough and searching in asce...
reviews.text: Paula was cordial but thorough and searching in ascertaining relevant facts. This was done in a relaxed atmosphere. in a pleasant office. Our meeting could not have been more professional. Thank you.

reviews.title: Ann the mortgage advisor could not be more helpful o...
reviews.text: Ann the mortgage advisor could not be more helpful of what we wanted to know excellent customer service

reviews.title: A Very Positive Experience
reviews.text: Cheryl was efficient, helpful and approachable throughout the process. Made me feel very much at ease. Thankyou.

reviews.title: I can't recommend DBS enough , first class service a...
reviews.text: I can't recommend DBS enough , first class service as always... I've just recently renewed my mortgage with DBS saving a unbelievable ££230 per month thanks to both Brian and Paula

reviews.title: Customer Service at its best!
reviews.text: Suzanne Eccleston explained all that I needed to know regarding switching mortgages in a clear and concise manner. She was friendly and helpful and put me at ease. I have to say that since getting our Mortgage from you in 2016 I have found my few interactions with your staff to be easy and they are all so friendly and helpful. Keep it up

reviews.title: My mortgage advisor was very personable and helpful...
reviews.text: My mortgage advisor was very personable and helpful but would have liked to have met face to face in the first instance.

reviews.title: Easy to talk too and excellent service

reviews.title: easy, simple and quick!
reviews.text: easy, simple and quick! took the stress out of the mortgage shopping.

reviews.title: Mortgage question answered quickly and very clearly
reviews.text: I asked a question about my mortgage and received a comprehensive and very informative reply swiftly by return. It is very much appreciated.

reviews.title: had a meeting today with a lovely lady paula, she wa...
reviews.text: had a meeting today with a lovely lady paula, she was so helpful explained really clearly and talked us through the the whole process., thank you very much paula for a very pleasant experience

reviews.title: Easy Process!
reviews.text: Made buying our first property easy. Great communication from the team.

reviews.title: Mortgage Application
reviews.text: We recently used a mortgage advisor (Paula) from Darlington Building Society and couldn’t be happier with the service we received. From start to finish, the process was smooth, professional, and reassuring. Paula was incredibly knowledgeable, taking the time to explain all of our options in clear, straightforward terms and making sure we felt comfortable at every step.

reviews.title: Being a member of a Society not just a client
reviews.text: Darlington Building Society staff have always treated me very much as a person rather than primarily as a source of income. During the mortgage application procedure, their advisor made sure I had the product that was exactly right for my family and our circumstances. Now, we are nearly 5 years into our financial relationship and I have always appreciated the human person-centred approach that the society's staff have shown whenever I have had need to contact them. The staff have always made me feel truly like a member of the Society rather than just a client.

reviews.title: Very helpful and keep you informed when fixed rate c...
reviews.text: Very helpful and keep you informed when fixed rate coming to an end. Offer competitive deals to existing customers

reviews.title: Seamless!
reviews.text: Seamless, with helpful newsletters sent out regularly.

reviews.title: The personal touch is second to none.
reviews.text: The personal touch is second to none. My mortgage experience was made all the smoother and with minimal stress from the mortgage team. They assisted me way over and beyond what was expected of them. 100% recommend Darlington BS.

reviews.title: Excellent support from outside the UK
reviews.text: We had to deal with Darlington from abroad to rearrange a buy to let mortgage, and they made the task stress-free. Their customer service was easy to navigate and excellent support.

reviews.title: Very helpful and understanding
reviews.text: We found Darlington Building Society very helpful with our situation and we're great in supplying us with a great mortgage. Also so easy to renew after our two year fixed rate was up. They gave plenty of options, fully recommend.

reviews.title: Great buy to let mortgage
reviews.text: I've had this buy to let mortgage for many years, very pleased with product which is reviewed every 2 years, and customer service is excellent

reviews.title: Mortgage
reviews.text: Looking at mortgage product needed to purchase my flat, the best option for me was Darlington Building society. A really good website and portal. Very happy with the service provided to date. I would recommend Dalington to family and friends.

reviews.title: Darlington customer service is amazing
reviews.text: Communicating with darlington has always been very easy! Since the very beginning I've worked with the same person and that makes everything super easy because they understand my situation without me having to explain again

reviews.title: It's ok .But staff need to learn politeness& C Service.
reviews.text: It's ok . Regularly get updates which is good . Spoke over the phone 2 times didn't find them polite. My mortgage ws/is 6.89 % which ridiculous but at the time interest was rising by Bank of England every other week

reviews.title: Great Service, great people

They have looked after us well since then and will stay with them until mortgage free in a few years time. Customer service personnel are so helpful.

reviews.text: 1st time buyer and Darlington have made it all very simple, Easy to get hold of when I needed them from start to finish and offered me the best deal.

reviews.text: Seamless to deal with. Always a person to speak to, and always great service. So much better than the endless automated robots at other banks.

reviews.text: I never had issues and when I contacted the customer service team they were polite and helpful. I would just say to improve the email communication as before I called a sent several emails and never had a response but once I called every thing was sorted

reviews.title: Porting with Darlington.
reviews.text: Easy to get through when calling. Staff are knowledgeable and always willing to help. Currently utilising the porting system to move to another property, which is very affordable.

reviews.title: I have been with Darlington building society since A...
reviews.text: I have been with Darlington building society since August 2020 and I have always received excellent service. Darlington gave me a mortgage when other lenders wouldn’t. I recently had to speak to Darlington and the 2 officers I dealt with were very helpful. Although they couldn’t solve the problem they gave me information to investigate different avenues. They were very professional. This is a smaller building society but they know how to deliver good customer service.

reviews.title: One of few lenders to welcome older applicants and a...
reviews.text: One of few lenders to welcome older applicants and at reasonable interest rate. Always helpful with queries and clear informative updates.

reviews.title: New customers to Darlington Building Society.
reviews.text: New customers to Darlington Building Society. All good so far.

reviews.title: We are about to come to the end of our 25 year mortg...
reviews.text: We are about to come to the end of our 25 year mortgage. Some years ago we came into financial difficulty and all the worry that brings. The meetings and discussions we had made life so much easier, the staff were brilliant. They did not judge and just helped us decide what was best for us. Here we are a couple of payments to go and we still have our house.

reviews.title: Efficient friendly & professional Staff.
reviews.text: Efficient friendly & professional Staff. Always ask if there is anything else they can help with.

reviews.title: My experience with Darlington was exceptional, espec...
reviews.text: My experience with Darlington was exceptional, especially during an incredibly challenging period in my life. The COVID-19 pandemic caused significant cash flow issues for me, which were further compounded by ill health. Despite these difficulties, Darlington provided unwavering support and understanding until I was able to reenter employment. Their customer service team was outstanding—compassionate, professional, and always willing to assist. I am truly grateful for their patience and dedication during such a tough time. Darlington went above and beyond to help, and I cannot recommend them highly enough. Thank you, Darlington (especially Brian), for your exceptional service and support when I needed it most.

We were surprised that the whole procedure was manual but being older we was perfectly happy with the process, it was in-depth and thorough. We found the interest rate to be competitive. We would recommend to other people.

I never had any issue with and in fact I have recommended them to my family and friends. A fantastic company!

reviews.text: It was smooth and clear prompt reply

reviews.title: Excellent customer service
reviews.text: Darlington provided us with an interest only mortgage despite being relatively advanced in years! The process was straightforward and they have kept us informed throughout the whole process and since the granting of the mortgage.

reviews.title: Supporting the older lender - thanks Darlington
reviews.text: Darlington were one of the few mortgage lenders who would offer us a mortgage due to our ages. They recognised we had excellent credit ratings and supported our aspiration to own a home again.

reviews.title: Darlington have provided me with a self build mortga...
reviews.text: Darlington have provided me with a self build mortgage in partnership with BuildLoan. They have been very supportive and good communicators throughout the process, alongside being quick to coordinate stage payments which has been critical in enabling the build process to run smoothly.

reviews.title: An older lady
reviews.text: As an older lady I was pleased that Darlington offered me a mortgage at my age.

reviews.title: DBS were very helpful and assisted me along the way.
reviews.text: DBS were very helpful and assisted me along the way. To add to this, no question went unanswered.

reviews.title: Gave a mortgage to pensioner!
reviews.text: Gave a mortgage to me as a retired person which I was unable to get from other banks. Fantastic as enabled to buy my own house for the first time in 20 years! Also got a great deal at a reasonable rate.

reviews.title: Reliable good service
reviews.text: The mortgage provided by the Darlington Building Society has been ideal for my needs and when it came up for review I was able to repay some of the capital and get a reasonable rate at a very challenging time. The only downside was several sources of information giving slightly different advice bt that was resolved by speaking to someone.

reviews.title: Interest rate reductions not sufficient
reviews.text: Despite the interest rate cuts by the bank of England the rate the reduction of our mortgage, which is on a variable rate, has been negilgible. Customer service has been good with prompt replies to inqueries.

reviews.title: Made our dream home ownership possible!
reviews.text: We’re incredibly grateful to the bank for providing us with a loan to help cover the down payment on our first home. Their support made it possible for us to take this important step, and we truly appreciate their assistance throughout the process.

reviews.title: Professional, Precise and Personal
reviews.text: Easy to contact, always helpful, uk based staff.

reviews.title: Darlington saved our home
reviews.text: Just when we thought there was no hope in our very complicated mortgage to save our home, Darlington processed our application via our amazing mortgage broker. Darlington is not complicated and it was quite stress free. Many thanks again

reviews.title: A real understanding of community values
reviews.text: I have had a mortgage with the society for many years. During this time I have switched mortgage deals a number of times to other products provided by the society. I have found the process pretty straight forward to do on my own using the website and through discussion with a member of the customer service team. In the past I have fallen into arrears with my mortgage due to a change in circumstances and whilst I buried my head in the sand for sometime as I was afraid of the repercussions of doing so when I eventually came up for air and spoke to the team about it I found them to be empathic in dealing with and helping me to get back on track which ultimately avoided me losing my family home. I am eternally grateful for the compassion shown to me by the society during this difficult period. I’m not sure I would have been helped to stay in my home by the bigger lenders! Keep up the great work Darlington Building Society. A local company with a real understanding of community.

reviews.title: Very quick process and always willing to help.
reviews.text: Very quick process and always willing to help.

reviews.title: Helpful staff
reviews.text: Easy to get through on telephone and staff so helpful and kind. Every time I have phoned staff always seem to have the answers and do not pass me to another person.

reviews.title: Darlington Building Society is our mortgage provider.
reviews.text: Darlington Building Society is our mortgage provider. And honestly, I don't know what we would have without them. They provided us with the mortgage we needed to buy our bungalow, which gave us a roof over heads! They have looked after since, with renewal quotes at excellent interest rates! We would highly recommend Darlington Building Society for customer service, product availability, knowledgeable staff and being there for us! Thank you Darlington

reviews.title: great customer service..
reviews.text: have been given great service every time i had an enquiry,service staff always very polite and knowledgable

reviews.title: As a first time buyer nearly 4 years ago I have had...
reviews.text: As a first time buyer nearly 4 years ago I have had a great experience with Darlington! Great customer service, quick responses and consistent communication!

reviews.title: Darlington asking for the Inns and Outs of a fart
reviews.text: When my wife and I applied for a mortgage via a mortgage broker, Darlington took a long time to make a descision to lend. They were quibbling over a £50 catalogue account that they wanted to be cleared before they would lend. ( Andwe have a joint income of over £100k) We had to remortgage with Darlington a second time , only because our solcitor forgot to register our New Build House in our names by the time the 2 year fixed rate expired. We could not use the whole market at the time becasue of that. Otherwise we would have got a much cheaper rate elsewhere.

reviews.title: Very happy with the product I have and efficient ser...
reviews.text: Very happy with the product I have and efficient service received.

reviews.title: Okay service
reviews.text: The online site and correspondence has been fine but I do think the rate I pay is a bit high but I agreed it so it is what it is. Hopefully I will get a more competitive rate on renewal.

reviews.title: Exceptionally friendly and proactive
reviews.text: I find the staff at Darlington exceptionally friendly and proactive. The are willing to help and show enthusiasm for their jobs. A rare commodity in today's world. I only use phone and online banking services.

reviews.title: Great service
reviews.text: I have found Darlington to be a caring bank giving me the best advice and information.

reviews.title: Darlington Building Society are so easy to work with
reviews.text: Darlington Building Society are so easy to work with, they have kept us in the loop throughout our first mortgage process and been amazing with our mortgage. Every question we’ve had has been answered quickly whilst putting our mind at easy. I would 100% recommend Darlington Building Society for a mortgage.

reviews.title: In general, the experience was good.

reviews.title: Self-Build Excellence
reviews.text: Darlington provided me with a mortgage suitable for my self-build. Funds are drawn down as needed. The team are highly responsive and the service is unobtrusively personal.

reviews.title: Two great years , no hassle .
reviews.text: Two great years , no hassle . Excellent service

reviews.title: Never a problem Always answer queries promptly and h...
reviews.text: Never a problem Always answer queries promptly and honestly

reviews.title: Friendly, helpful Building Society
reviews.text: They are a friendly branch at Northallerton and happy to answer any question regardless how big or small it is. I wanted to come into a branch to arrange renew my mortage as I was not looking forward to speaking over the phone, but the lady I spoke to, explained everything brilliently and in languiage that was simple and easy to understand. I didn't have to take time off work to come into the branch, which was even better. I also have a savings account with the Darlington Building Society where I have managed to save up to make improvements around my house.

reviews.title: Best Mortgage Option if you work Overseas
reviews.text: As someone who works overseas Dartington was one of the few lenders who would offer me a mortgage despite an excellent credit rating. We live in a globalized world Dartington appreciates that reality.

reviews.title: We were introduced to Darlington via a mortgage broker.
reviews.text: We were introduced to Darlington via a mortgage broker. I have called them a couple of times querying things such as early settlement or the option to remortgage both times have received really good friendly service. If we do move or wish to borrow more would certainly go to Darlington first

reviews.title: Smooth and hassle free process
reviews.text: A very smooth and hassle free process to set up a new mortgage. Information was easy to find online and discussions with customer advisor was straightforward.

reviews.title: Very excellent service and trustworthy.
reviews.text: Excellent friendly service always pleasant and polite and willing to go to the extra mile to help you

reviews.title: Always been low interests rates, for my mortgages, a...
reviews.text: Always been low interests rates, for my mortgages, and the telephone service, is exceptional, they answer quickly and you get to chat to the specific person very quickly.

reviews.title: Couldn't have asked for a better experience.
reviews.text: Couldn't have asked for a better experience. Prompt responses to questions and prompt with payment to allow me keys to my house in the morning on my day of completion

reviews.title: Always very friendly and helpful
reviews.text: Always very friendly and helpful

reviews.title: Very friendly and upfront about any charges so easy...

reviews.title: Helpful and knowledgeable staff.
reviews.text: Helpful and knowledgeable staff. I had a niche query. The person who answered didn't know the answer but passed it on and I received a full and helpful response the same day.

reviews.title: Brilliant start to finish no complaints at all , cus...
reviews.text: Brilliant start to finish no complaints at all , customer service was second to none brilliant rates very competitive, easy to use account . Would definitely recommend to friends and family .

reviews.title: Great customer care
reviews.text: Very helpful when enquiring about paying extra payments to reduce the term. Rang me back when they said they wood.

reviews.title: Very Friendly
reviews.text: Have used DBS for many years and have always found them to be friendly and helpful. Nothing ever seems to be a problem and the staff go out of their way to ensure that I always receive a very high standard of customer service.

reviews.title: Darlington has the Human touch and gives peace of mind
reviews.text: Darlington staff have been extremely helpful in my case. I was having financial difficulties and advice and guidance was forthcoming with nothing ever being too much trouble.

reviews.title: Exceptional Service and Support!
reviews.text: I recently had the pleasure of working with Darlington Building Society, and I can't recommend them enough! From the beginning, their team was helpful and knowledgeable, guiding through every step of the mortgage process. They made what could have been a stressful experience smooth and enjoyable. If you're looking for a reliable mortgage company that cares about its clients, look no further!

reviews.title: It was a smooth and easy process, and I am so gratef...
reviews.text: It was a smooth and easy process, and I am so grateful you considered my circumstances.

reviews.title: Seamless Experience
reviews.text: My experience was seamless. I couldn’t have asked for a better experience, especially for a first time buyer.

reviews.title: We like the way they use human beings to make a deci...
reviews.text: We like the way they use human beings to make a decision and not some electronic algorithm. We had no idea that retirees like us would even be considered for a mortgage. We like old fashioned values and the human touch

reviews.title: You offer timely and excellent service
reviews.text: You offer timely and excellent service

reviews.title: New mortage application.
reviews.text: I applied for a mortgage at the age of 79 yrs and was accepted with a very good 5 yrs fixed rate. Excellent. The local Branch staff are very knowledgeable and polite and patient !!

reviews.title: phone service
reviews.text: always very helpful when phoning for either advice or updates regarding the mortgage. As we only deal over the phone the service provided is excellent

reviews.title: Mortgage lender
reviews.text: We have had our mortgage with Darlington for a number of years. They were very helpful when we moved and took out a larger mortgage. Whenever we have a question or want to make an overpayment they are always very helpful and give excellent service.

reviews.title: Straight forward dealing with them, easy to get thro...
reviews.text: Straight forward dealing with them, easy to get through when you need to call. Had the best deal for my situation.

reviews.title: Exceptional Building Society
reviews.text: Exceptional Building Society who supplied us with a mortgage where other companies would not. Always fantastic service, kind and attentive team. They have changed our life.

reviews.title: 1st mortgage
reviews.text: This is our 1st mortgage and we found the process to be smooth and effortless with Darlington Building Society. We're very grateful.

reviews.title: Have been with Darlington for several years.
reviews.text: Have been with Darlington for several years. I’m a customer who resides overseas, I have had no problems communicating with the team , easy , understanding and patient each time. Have been able to maintain repayments to a affordable amount through the continued refinancing offers

reviews.title: Excellent staffing and great support.

reviews.title: Great building society for first time buyers!!
reviews.text: We were first time buyers and got our mortgage the DBS and they sent everything across and all communication was clear and really helpful to us as first time buyers. Plus the product fee wasn’t as ridiculous as some of those bigger banks!

reviews.title: Out of the ordinary mortgages & customer service
reviews.text: We went with Darlington because they were recommended by our broker for providing 'out of the ordinary' mortgages - which suited us! They have since provided not only a good product but excellent customer service with very helpful people to answer and queries we have had.

reviews.title: Always great rates over the full term of my mortgage...
reviews.text: Always great rates over the full term of my mortgage and staff are always very helpful and polite at the other end of the telephone.

reviews.title: We had our very first mortgage with Darlington.
reviews.text: We had our very first mortgage with Darlington. And the best rate available at the time. Everything was so easy to fill out with plenty of support when I needed it. Darlington was amazing they talked me all the way through from beginning to end. My mortgage is up for renewal February next next year and I’m hoping to stay with Darlington. Amazing staff very helpfull nothing is to much trouble, if I didn’t understand anything all I had to do was pick up the phone, or send and email. Out of all the potential lenders Darlington came out on top for us. Great rates!!

reviews.title: Clear and simple
reviews.text: No problems clear and simple right from the beginning! I’m a first time buyer and they made the process so easy to follow!

reviews.title: Individuality
reviews.text: They helped through a difficult time to make a transition in my life easy to buy the property I needed . Good at keeping you informed love the monthly updates.

reviews.title: Every time I have dealt with you it’s been a...
reviews.text: Every time I have dealt with you it’s been a pleasure

reviews.title: Good customer service from Darlington
reviews.text: Good customer service from Darlington

reviews.title: Darlington feel like Building Societies used to, wit...
reviews.text: Darlington feel like Building Societies used to, with caring, helpful people to advise customers. They were absolutely wonderful in arranging our Mortgage. The members of staff were extremely knowledgeable and helpful. We had tried all the big names but felt from start to finish that Darlington staff were trying to do their very best for us and the experience was so easy and smooth. We are 3 years in with the mortgage and couldn't be happier with Darlington, who keep us up to date from time to time, without it feeling too often.

reviews.title: Couldn’t ask for anything more
reviews.text: Have had a great experience with Darlington Building Society over the past two years

reviews.text: Not been with them long but everything going well so far, good rates.

reviews.title: Such a helpful Building Society.
reviews.text: We were refused a mortgage at many other banks Darlington Building Society were the only ones who would take us on because of our age, they have been so helpful and we renewed our fixed rate again with them this year so easy to do online.

reviews.title: Excellent mortgage advisor
reviews.text: Excellent mortgage advisor, very knowledgeable and helpful. Phoned back on time and took care of everything.

reviews.text: I always rated darlington high but I've never missed one payment and when I ask for a small amount to generate my kitchen because of my age I was denied as you don't take my wages into account, this is find strange because if I passed you would still get your money, very dissapointed

reviews.text: We have not had any issues at all to date, very happy

reviews.title: Darlington is professional, and speedy . clear i...
reviews.text: Darlington was very professional, speedy and clear in the way they handled our mortgage application. There were no delays or unclear communications. This proved the winning formular for us. Darlington also provided the most competitive rates for our situation and mortgage.

reviews.title: A wonderful opportunity after retirement
reviews.text: The Darlington has given us the chance to get back on the property ladder which we had thought was impossible. As pensioners we really appreciate this as it’s reduced our outgoings considerably & has provided us with a much loved affordable home by the sea in wonderful Northumberland. Thanks so much

reviews.title: Great Experience
reviews.text: Great experience, we had to have a debt management mortgage due to my husbands credit but after two years seamlessly transferred to a normal mortgage, overpayments are easy, always someone at the end of the phone or email. It's been a fantastic experience.

reviews.title: Darlington's service is excellent and I would strong...
reviews.text: Darlington's service is excellent and I would strongly recommend it. Thank you so much for all the support!!!

reviews.title: Gave my daughter a chance where no one else would
reviews.text: Gave my daughter a chance where no one else would

reviews.title: This is a Bank with a Building Society heart.
reviews.text: This is a Bank with a Building Society heart. My own bank of over 40 years considered me too old for a remortgage. Darlington could see my potential as a good customer and provided me with a fixed remortgage deal, at the end of which offered me another suitable fixed deal. The remortgage supported my plan for moving to my forever home.

reviews.title: Excellent Service
reviews.text: I am 80 years old and had many experiences over my time in dealing with various banks and building societies. Some I rate as poor, some I rate as middle of the road and some I rate as good, but I must say in all honesty Darlington Building Society is best by miles. Every staff member in all departments know exactly what they are doing and about the products that they are providing. They have the knack of explaining things in a simple and easy way to understand on exactly what their products are about. What I like most of all is every member of staff are so knowledgeable and you don't get passed from pillar to post like many other banks and building societies I have dealt with. We have recently moved homes and they made porting our mortgage over very easy and with perfection.

reviews.title: Darlington helped me with my 1st mortgage, They mad...
reviews.text: Darlington helped me with my 1st mortgage, They made it a breeze from start to finish, I would highly recommend then to anyone looking to get on the property ladder

reviews.title: Fantastic got me a mortgage so I can be near my fami...
reviews.text: Fantastic got me a mortgage so I can be near my family for a retired lady Darlingtons made it easy for me

reviews.title: Smooth process
reviews.text: I am grateful to having been connected to Darlington Building Society, we were new in UK when we decided to purchase our own flat, and while we had worries about getting approved on mortgage application, our process was smooth and hassle free.

reviews.text: I was offered a mortgage that suited my needsa as a pensioner. When I added a second mortgage a few years ago the help and advice I received was second to none.

reviews.title: Thank you Darlington Building Society
reviews.text: I have been treated very respectfully and very well all along, and the mortgage rate I was offered and followed through with is excellent. Thank you Darlington Building Society

reviews.text: Really helpful Would thoroughly recommend

reviews.title: We are loyal customers for our mortgages from Darlin...
reviews.text: We are loyal customers for our mortgages from Darlington Building Society due to our salary being paid in USD. Darlington Building Society really do look at the individual when assessing for their mortgages. It’s a very personal touch and much appreciated. I have been dealing with the same mortgage adviser for quite a few years at Darlington and she has been excellent. Darlington have made it possible to remain homeowners when other lenders were not interested in the ‘ hassle ‘ of non UK currency salaries.

reviews.title: We had rented our home for 40 years and because our...
reviews.text: We had rented our home for 40 years and because our mortgage lady Nadine was able to speak to a person and explain our situation you granted us a mortgage and we own our home which we love

reviews.title: Excellent all round
reviews.text: Great company, excellent service, very helpful, excellent all round

reviews.title: Very Good and quick turnaround.
reviews.text: Very Good and quick turnaround. Kept us informed at every stage of the process

reviews.title: Darlington have always been a delight
reviews.text: Darlington have always been a delight. They're knowledgable about mortgages and helped to find me a deal that worked with my very specific/niche requirements. While they weren't the best value, they did provide me with reassurances that they would support my needs and my requirements and help to make life easier.

reviews.title: We have been with the Darlington for 22 years and ea...
reviews.text: We have been with the Darlington for 22 years and each time our deal was coming to the end, their advisor was brilliant, talking us through all options and finding the best one for us, and even saved us money and reduced the length of our mortgage. Would and have highly recommended the company.

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.text: They have always been helpful each time I have needed to renew my mortgage, I have been surprised that no mention has ever been made of my age, currently 75 and potentially still 8 years to run, why would I want to go with anyone else?

reviews.title: I have a mortgage with Darlington and their communic...
reviews.text: I have a mortgage with Darlington and their communication and offering has been superb. They are so straight forward to deal with and have made it easy to understand and navigate.

reviews.title: Managed to sort out an issue
reviews.text: Managed to sort out an issue where the first payment was taken twice. After calling this resolved in a timely manner. The customer service was understanding about the situation and assured me the issue will be sorted.

reviews.title: Customer service is always very efficient, and easy...
reviews.text: Customer service is always very efficient, and easy to get in touch with when needed.

reviews.title: We had a complex scenario when taking out our mortga...
reviews.text: We had a complex scenario when taking out our mortgage however DBS offered a good option which was flexible and suited our needs.
